ValidationRule.description: This validation rule is used to block users from editing the Opportunity Stage so that Stage Movements are consistent throughout the system.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT($Setup.BypassTriggersValidation__c.DisableValidation__c) && IsActive__c = TRUE && ISCHANGED( StageName ) && TFBypassStageValidation__c = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please do not update the Stage of the Opportunity. Only automatic Stage Movements are allowed.
